name: Tel-Tel Stadium
description: Tel-Tel Stadium (ＴＥＬ・ＴＥＬスタジアム, "TEL · TEL Stadium") is a Sega Mega Drive baseball video game released in 1990. Along with Tel-Tel Mahjong it is a part of the Tel-Tel series and allows for online multiplayer through the Sega MegaModem and the Sega Net Work System, as well play against computer opponents.
